nodes.text: E-Web heavy repeating blaster cannon  (Gideon's Imperial remnant)

An Imperial remnant led by Moff Gideon utilized a newer model of the E-Web heavy repeating blaster cannon on Nevarro around 9 ABY. The cannon was able to be utilized while detached from its turret body.
In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the E-Web(15) Heavy Repeating Blaster was a newer model of the E-Web that was in use during the Thrawn campaign in 9 ABY.
